mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trips (user_id, content, sido_code, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{sidoCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})

INSERT INTO trip_attractions (trip_id, attraction_no, day, sequence) VALUES
(#{tripId}, #{attraction.no}, #{attraction.day}, #{attraction.sequence})
mapper.select: SELECT t.trip_id, t.user_id, t.content, t.sido_code, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.copied_count, a.attraction_no, b.title, b.first_image1, b.addr1, b.latitude, b.longitude, a.day, a.sequence FROM trips t LEFT JOIN trip_attractions a ON t.trip_id = a.trip_id LEFT JOIN attractions b ON a.attraction_no = b.no WHERE t.trip_id = ${tripId}

SELECT c.trip_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.sido_code, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.copied_count, a.attraction_no, b.title, b.first_image1, b.addr1, b.latitude, b.longitude, a.day, a.sequence FROM (SELECT t.trip_id, t.user_id, t.content, t.sido_code, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.copied_count FROM trips t LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}) c LEFT JOIN trip_attractions a ON c.trip_id = a.trip_id LEFT JOIN attractions b ON a.attraction_no = b.no
mapper.update: UPDATE trips SET is_public = CASE WHEN is_public = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE trip_id = #{tripId}
